Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
Amenities
Experience the Best of 55+ Florida Living
We’re proud to offer a peaceful, welcoming environment where residents can enjoy the best years of their life. At Arcadia Village, you’ll find friendly neighbors, resort-style amenities, and a lifestyle that’s both relaxing and engaging.
Whether you’re enjoying a quiet morning on your lanai or joining a community event at the clubhouse, Arcadia Village is a place you’ll be proud to call home.
end column
end container
end section

Option-2:

end column
end container
start column
Property Features:
18-Hole Golf Course
2 Clubhouses
2 Outdoor Pools and Spas
Tennis Courts
Shuffleboard
Fitness Center
Game Rooms
Library
On-Site Management
Gated Entry
end column
end container
end section
Option-1:
Option-2:
start Slider JS
start builder section
start container
start column
Explore the Local Area
Arcadia Village is located in the heart of DeSoto County, offering easy access to the region’s best beaches, parks, shopping, and medical centers. Whether you prefer exploring Florida nature or relaxing in town, there’s always something nearby to enjoy.
end column
end container

end column
end container

Stop By and Visit Us
Arcadia Village
2692 NE Hwy. 70, #532
Arcadia, FL 34266
Get Directions
Call Us
(863)-494-5669
Drop Us a Line
arcadia@legacymhc.com
Office Hours
Monday – Friday:
8:30am – 4:30pm
Saturday – Sunday:
By Appointment

community raves
We love living here the Manager and staff owner are wonderful and always have something to do whether it is a dance or bingo cards or even lifting weights or swimming, Just a good place to live.
Earl Stanton | Google
Real nice place, well taken care of, manufacturer homes you purchase. Beautiful clubhouse and facilities. Absolutely lovely community and nice people.
Laurie Conrad | Google
Great place to own a double wide. Wonderful neighbors. Lots of activities and 2 – 9 hole Golf Courses.
Anthony James Verhagen | Google
